attributes.action: Prohibit the use of vaccine or health passports in any UK setting
attributes.additional_details: The use of any form of medical or health certification is highly discriminatory, and is the first step towards a “show me your papers” checkpoint society. Medical records must remain personal and private to the individual. We cannot allow people to be excluded from society simply because they have legally opted out of having a medical procedure they may not want. UK citizens are human beings, not infectious biohazards. We must all be treated equally and fairly, without discrimination.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for vaccine/health passports or Covid-ID to be used anywhere in the UK.  This will include (but is not limited to) use in any public or private setting, business, on public transport or for use in international travel.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
